title: Insolvency resolutions likely to clock a fresh record in FY25: IBBI chief
description: The Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code (IBC) is seeing a rise in resolved cases, with a focus on innovative approaches and transparency to improve recovery rates. Efforts to save firms from liquidation and address delays in resolution processes are being emphasized by regulators and industry experts.
